name: Burn the Wicked
effect: Target makes Toughness test or begins to Burn

name: Silencing the Dogs of War
effect: Target weapon with Jam - on success weapon Jams

name: Flap
effect: Target makes Presence test. On failure flees battlefield per morale rules

name: ZIGZAG
effect: Target treated as -3 to hit for all Ranged Attacks (stacks with modifiers)

name: Command
effect: Target gains extra activation (once per Scenario only)

name: Let There Be Light
effect: Fog pushed back, all Ranged weapons become 24" range next round

name: Once More Unto the Breach
effect: All models within 3" of caster auto-pass morale for rest of Scenario

name: Chin Up
effect: Grants 2HP to target who has taken at least 2 damage

name: Mistaken Identity
effect: Target dead model removed from table but considered survived Scenario

name: Artillery
effect: Select point, all within 3" make Agility test or take 1D10 damage

name: Booby Trap
effect: Select terrain within 12". Models within 1" take 1D10 damage when triggered

name: Death Was Written Large
effect: All Downed models are instead killed for remainder of Scenario

name: Blood For Blood
effect: Caster can give their HP to another model (1:1 ratio)

name: Detonate
effect: Target with Explode weapon - on failure weapon explodes

name: Die Already
effect: Target who has taken damage makes Presence test or drops to 1HP

name: Cries of the Wounded
effect: Target makes Presence test or takes 1D8 damage

name: Cursed
effect: Target makes Presence test. On failure cursed (-2 to all rolls until end)
